item.title: OSCP - Part 1 - The Phases of Pentesting
item.description: In this second installment of the OSCP series, we will take a deeper look into the overall structure of a penetration test, as it provides us a framework to build our hacking skills onto. It is also the first thing that we read in the introduction of Georgia Weidman’s book “Penetration Testing - A Hands-On Introduction to Hacking” from No Starch Press.

item.title: OSCP - Part 0 - Overview
item.description: As I have a deep interest in cybersecurity, I felt is time to get serious and to set a clear goal. So my goal will be the Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP) certificate.
